BIO

As a software engineer, I possess expertise in multiple programming languages and technologies. I have delivered numerous high-quality projects and possess strong collaboration and communication skills.

Cloud Primero x 433

Software Engineer

Designed attractive and user-friendly interfaces. Implemented features, data storage, API integration, optimized performance for different devices/platforms. Collaborated for timely and budget-friendly delivery. Guided junior developers for skill improvement.

LN Technologies

Junior Software Engineer

Worked on StaySafe app for emergency responses. Created emergency communication and Rapid SOS. Implemented stripe for subscription payment and OTP for password reset. Configured user location in Firebase and send push notifications to nearby users for alerts.

Backend Developer

Contributed to FinPocket aapp, an investment platform for trading and investment. Developed secure fintech app using Java Spring Boot framework with high-quality code. Analyzed software and requirements to implement features.
